name: Aim in Space
description:
Immerse yourself in the exciting atmosphere of the game, which will test your reaction and aiming accuracy. Here you will travel through space locations that must be protected from alien attacks. Unlike similar games, here you need to not only click on the target with the same mouse button. Everything is much more interesting! Different forms of attack must be used to destroy the various spaceships of the aliens.

The game has several locations, each of which has 8 levels waiting for you. As you progress through the levels, you will unlock new types of enemies. Will you be able to successfully complete all the tasks of the game? Try this challenge!
